resources.string: Your one stop solution to Day to Day worries at IIIT

myIIIT app helps students of International Institute of Information Technology, Hyderabad keep track of their meals and attendance. This app works on any network so users do not need to login into IIIT network

This app is NOT an official app by International Institute Of Information Technology, Hyderabad. No piece of your credential data is stored on any form of web database. If you are concerned about the security about the security of the app kindly look at the code on the GitHub on the link below.
